bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.flavor: A band-aid a day keeps the undead away.

medkit.name: Med Kit
medkit.flavor: For if it's merely a flesh wound.

backpack.name: Fanny Pack
backpack.description: When this is equipped, increase your available inventory slots by 1. (Up to a maximum of 9 inventory slots)

holster.name: Weapon Holster
holster.description: When this is equipped, increase your available weapon slots by 1 (Up to a maximum of 4 weapon slots)

belt.name: More Pockets!
belt.description: Delete this item. Increase your available equipment slots by 1 (Up to a maximum of 5 equipment slots)

barricade1.name: Sandbags!
barricade1.description: Delete this item. Build a barricade anywhere with 2d6 health.

barricade2.name: Boards and Nails
barricade2.description: Delete this item. Build a barricade with 4d6 health at the entrance of any room.

armor1.name: Duct Tape Armor
armor1.flavor: Enough Duct Tape can do just about anything.

armor2.name: Sporting Pads
armor2.flavor: Hit them with the sporting ball while in your sporting protection while doing the sport.

armor4.name: Plate Armor
armor4.description: Increase your Armor by 10. Reduce dodge by 2.
armor4.flavor: Time to get medieval on their ass.

dodge1.name: Exercise Tape
dodge1.flavor: It's probably just a mental thing, but you feel limber.

dodge2.name: Nice Shoes
dodge2.description: Increase dodge by 2. Only 1 can be equipped at a time.
dodge2.flavor: Literally just shoes that are nice. But like, super nice though.

dodge3.name: Exercise Clothes
dodge3.description: Increase dodge by 6. Has no effect when your armor is 5 or more.

knife.name: Knife
knife.flavor: Great for cutting vegetables, fruit, and brains.

baseballbat.name: Baseball Bat
baseballbat.flavor: It is now past the time... for America's favorite pastime.

katana.name: Katana
katana.flavor: Forgive me sensei, I must go all out. Just this once.

axe.name: Axe
axe.flavor: Time to chop up some firewood.

chainsaw.name: Chainsaw
chainsaw.flavor: It's about to be a massacre.

lawnmower.name: Lawnmower
lawnmower.description: The turn you use this, you attack as you move, dealing damage to each square you move through

crossbow.name: Crossbow
crossbow.description: If you kill your target, leave a marker at the target. You can regain 1 Bolt by picking up the marker.
crossbow.flavor: Automatically makes you the most popular character.

bow.name: Compound Bow
bow.description: If you kill your target, leave a marker at the target. You can regain 1 Ammo by picking up the marker.

machinegun.name: Machine Gun
machinegun.flavor: Our bullets will blot out the sun.

flamethrower.name: Flamethrower
flamethrower.description: This weapon fires in a line of 5 spaces, dealing damage to all targets within the line.
flamethrower.flavor: Turns out the zombies have a weakness to being lit on freakin' fire.
